thread.title: Tata Motors sales up 1.32 pct at 40,154 units in July
thread.title_full: Tata Motors sales up 1.32 pct at 40,154 units in July | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Tata Motors sales up 1.32 pct at 40,154 units in July
text:
Other Articles Rough ride Honda Cars India posts 18.44% increase in July sales Apple Inc, BMW in courtship with an eye on car collaboration Tata Motors today reported 1.32 per cent increase in total sales at 40,154 units in July as compared to 39,629 units in the same month last year.
Domestic sales of Tata Motorsâ€™ commercial and passenger vehicles marginally declined at 35,076 units during the month as against 35,266 units sold in July, 2014.
Sales of passenger vehicles in the domestic market in July stood at 10,389 units as against 9,167 units in the same month previous year, up 13.33 per cent, Tata Motors said in a statement.
The sales of the passenger cars in July, 2015 were up 27.1 per cent at 8,520 units as compared to 6,703 units in July, 2014.
The growth trend was driven by the cars segment, specifically the new launches of Zest, Bolt and the new GenX Nano, it added.
UV sales, however, declined by 24 per cent at 1,869 units in July, 2015.
In the commercial vehicles segment, domestic sales were at 24,687 units, down 5 per cent over July 2014, the company said.
Exports during the month stood at 5,078 units as compared to 4,363 units in July 2014, up 16.38 per cent.
First Published on August 01, 2015 6:47 pm
